tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Tekkit Part 30 - A Touch of Nature
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The boys try their best to repair the damage caused and travel back to the factory with everything they can carry, and are greeted by a visitor wanting to reclaim their goods! Sjin's Channel: www.youtube.com Duncan's Channel: www.youtube.com Sips's Channel: www.youtube.com Tekkit Download: www.technicpack.net Textures: bdcraft.net ● Yogscast Gear: yogscast.spreadshirt.co.uk ● Facebook: www.facebook.com ● Twitter: www.twitter.com ● Forums: yogscast.com ● Podcast: itunes.apple.com ● Powered by Chillblast: www.chillblast.com ● PO Box: The Yogscast, PO Box 3125, Bristol, BS2 2DG

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Well don't trust lewis with﻿ explosive stuff :)
Ye its the house for﻿ SMRT corp :3
GO TO THE FUCKING HOUSE NOW!﻿
nvm﻿ o.0
i think who ever built that japaneses﻿ house blew up the engines
We dug to deep! We﻿ dug too deep Louis!
drama﻿
get a free itunes giftcard when you download the app "apptrailers" and enter the code﻿﻿ assassion200
when is lidecoffe comming﻿ back
now you should fight sips co because they might﻿ make jaffa cakes
go to the house near﻿ oil and pig island!
Kill﻿ sips
i was just confused and ya i will thank you.﻿
so have you guys went to the pagoda dungen﻿ yet?
Are you french? It's﻿ Lewis not Louis Im french too by the way.
Lewis is﻿ not carbon neutral or eco friendly is he? just covers the crater of crap. throws iron buckets into the chasms. c'mon man...
No﻿ prob :)
That's for the old tekkit series.﻿

No one is probably going to read this but I will write it anyways because i feel that at least ONE person will Im a commentator. I know that there is alot of others, but again Im different I promise that.. If you give me a chance ill show you. I would love nothing more than to have a decent amount of followers on YouTube If anyone who reads this could press the THUMBS UP so other people will see it. Just a simple press﻿ of a button can make my dream come true. Thank You.
Hey﻿ Lewis... OMEGA-3s.

Have﻿ you﻿ ever wanted a paid app﻿ in﻿﻿ the﻿ app store but﻿ didn't have any﻿ money. Well here is﻿ your solution.. 1. download "app trailers" in the﻿﻿ app﻿﻿ store 2. use﻿﻿ the referral code﻿ "ableapps﻿" and﻿ gain﻿ an﻿ extra﻿ 50﻿ points!!! 3. redeem your points for a amazon gift﻿ card, paypal﻿ credit, itunes gift card﻿ and﻿ many more!!!
I've watched 3 Yogvids in a row﻿ that mentioned "Digging too deep"
that is duncans old house﻿ before this series started
Where is﻿ Sips?
Nobody built it. Those things﻿ spawn randomly in tekkt.

Reviewer.Music: As perviously explained above, Making Audio versions of songs. Here are some things I will be uploading. Anything from Rock to Metal to Rap. It will be in Random order and maybe some full albums / Live albums.

Reviewer.Books: warriors series and redwall series. That's all I read.
Reviewer.Movies: harry potter series, transformers 1, beavis and butt-head doamerica, spaceballs, joe dirt, the naked gun series, and any jim carrey movie.
